title: Mash Up
overview: T.J. Miller and friends are bringing a whole new style of stand-up to Comedy Central with the series premiere of Mash Up. Hosted by Miller, and featuring stand-up performances from some of today's hottest comedians, Mash Up is a unique new half-hour series that combines stand-up with stylized visualizations, enhancing the jokes and creating a completely new experience in stand-up. In addition, Mash Up features exciting sketch comedy and animation segments around the theme of mismatched topics coming together for hilarious results.
